attributes.action: Legislate against shops to stop them refusing cash payments.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure cash remains a trading commodity for the future.
attributes.background: If we allow shops and other places to refuse cash then we are moving to a cashless society which allows your every transaction to be monitored and eventually controlled. Any establishment that refuses to take legal cash money should be legally stopped from doing so.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Make it illegal for retail and hospitality businesses to refuse cash as payment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653396
